title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the core values and 'DNA' of the organization, the desired features and functionalities of the tool, and the target audience.

title: Design System Architecture for CorporateDNAAlignmentTool
description: Design the overall system architecture, focusing on a modular and scalable design that prioritizes maintainability, considers edge cases, error handling, performance optimizations, and security best practices. The architecture should encompass frontend, backend, and database components, as well as integration points with existing organizational systems. A plan for iterative development, testing, and implementation stages will be outlined, along with documentation requirements. Collaboration with relevant stakeholders (frontend-developer, backend-developer, database-specialist, devops-engineer, security-specialist) is essential to ensure a comprehensive design. Post completion, specific components can be delegated to individual team members for further development.

title: Develop Frontend
description: Implement the user interface and frontend logic for the tool, ensuring a user-friendly and intuitive experience.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the backend logic and functionality, including the integration with organizational systems and data sources.

title: Set up Database
description: Design and implement the database schema and data models required for the tool.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the tool adheres to security best practices and organizational policies, including authentication, authorization, and data protection.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the tool.

title: Conduct Testing
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the tool meets the defined requirements and standards.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the tool, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance procedures.

title: Deploy and Launch
description: Deploy the tool to the production environment and coordinate the official launch, including user training and communication.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
